name: Topdown Zombie Maze
description:
Background Story:

You and your partner are 2 secret agents on a mission to investigate a government blacksite. While you were reconnoitering the facility, you accidentally let loose a classified bio-weapon. Now that the monster is chasing you, the facility went into lockdown. You only have two options now: Find 3 access keys scatter around the facility and escape through the dangerous service tunnel, or, SHOOT your way out.

How to Play:

This is a Local 2-Player Co-op Adventure Shooting Game.

Player 1: WASD to move, Space to Shoot

Player 2: Up Down Left  Right to Move, Right Ctrl to Shoot

Enemy:  with 50HP, deals 3 Dmg/sec to the player when in contact. 

The enemy will keep chasing the player that is closest to him.

Weapons: Num 1 is regular bullet deals 1 Dmg,

Num 2 is an equalizer gun that deals 0 Dmg but will stun the enemy for 3 secs.

Goal: Find 3 Access Keys to escape OR Eliminate the enemy

Pickups: Try to shoot the Vending Machines and a surprise shall appear

REMEBER! TEAM WORK is crucial!!!!
